Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Grand City Hotel Berlin East in Berlin (Lichtenberg), you'll be close to Sportforum and Alexanderplatz. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Velodrom and Lido Orankesee.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 317 guestrooms. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including a health club and bicycles to rent. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and wedding services.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 1 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Berlin? This hotel has 7804 square feet (725 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and a meeting room. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 1 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Take advantage of recreation opportunities including a health club and bicycles to rent. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and wedding services.

Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

With a stay at Grand City Hotel Berlin East in Berlin (Lichtenberg), you'll be close to Sportforum and Alexanderplatz. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Velodrom and Lido Orankesee.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Sportforum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Velodrom - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Lido Orankesee - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Stasi Museum Berlin - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Weissensee Park - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Volkspark Friedrichshain - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Simon-Dach-Strasse - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Bim and Boom Children's Playground - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
O2 World - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
East Side Gallery - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Kollwitzplatz - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Oberbaum Bridge - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Berlin Conference Center - 4.4 km / 2.8 mi
Friedrichsfelde Palace - 4.4 km / 2.8 mi
Alexa Shopping Center - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi

The nearest airports are:
Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 12.5 km / 7.8 mi
Berlin (SXF-Schoenefeld) - 16 km / 10 mi

The preferred airport for Grand City Hotel Berlin East is Berlin (TXL-Tegel).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: Late cancellations, no show and early departure: 100% charge for the entire booking. Please note: Starting 1st of January 2014 in Berlin, a mandatory City Tax on the room rate shall be paid by the guest. Please Note : As per the hotel value added tax (VAT) for admission to sauna (including sauna services offered by the hotel) will be increased to the full value added tax rate of 19% in Germany from 01st of July 2015 Effective Jan 01 2018 the Hotel will be charge for each Parking lots 13€ per day.
